label: 摂関家
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: the Regents’ Line. These powerful courtiers from the Northern Fujiwara family monopolized the positions of regent (sesshō) and kanpaku (viceroy, chancellor) in the Heian and early medieval periods.
